name: Out of Ice Cream!
description:
A sci-fi 2.5D chaotic, challenge-based game. 

Your ice cream ship enters a zero gravity field! Try to fulfill customer orders as the ice cream machine flies around out of control in your truck!. 

Use this link if you want to play in browser, but it works better standalone: https://connect.unity.com/mg/other/untitled-5463?fbclid=IwAR0ihOy6oYkaekAKu8pZ7Oo2D28v-4nqndzILZ1lg3u-kR3sqh1e0Wyb3QY
